name: Jurassic Island Rescue and Escape Pro
name_original: Jurassic Island Rescue and Escape Pro
description:
"If you love Dinosaurs, you gotta check this out!"

**** It's the middle of the night, and you get an unexpected phone call. ****

"The President needs you for a secret mission. Your country needs you. You are the best soldier we have. "

"Yes, sir" you respond. "What do you need?"

"We are sending the chopper to pick you up now. You will be get a mission briefing when you get picked up. Be ready in 10 minutes." ---'Click'

Where are you going? Why is the president calling me in the middle of the night - whats going on?

The chopper arrives, you get in. Your mission : There has been a disaster at a secret experimental island. You must rescue the researchers, get them to the helicopter, set the dinosaur traps, recover the data, set the charges to destroy the main base, and escape on a boat.

The game is loaded with fun missions, plenty of dinosaur action.
